title: About me
text:
My main responsibilities at Swisstransplant are risk prediction in organ transplantation, developing novel tools to assist quality control, and statistical reporting of the transplantation activity in Switzerland.
I am also a member of the scientific committee of the Swiss Transplant Cohort Study (STCS), a founding member of the interest group Statistics in Organ Transplantation (SOT), and a guest researcher at the CRS.
